summary: A configuration container that defines all architectural hyperparameters for a VisualBERT multimodal model, including vocabulary size, hidden dimensions, visual embedding size, transformer depth, attention heads, activation functions, dropout rates, position and token type settings, and optional flags for bypassing the transformer or sharing visual embedding initialization.
business_intent: Allows developers to easily customize and instantiate VisualBERT models for tasks that combine text and image data, such as visual question answering or imageâ€‘text retrieval, by providing a single source of truth for model architecture and initialization settings.
